snippet.title: Melbourne pedestrians hurt in CBD hit-and-run, Victorian police say
snippet.content: Two pedestrians have been injured after being hi by a car, which did not stop, near Melbourne's Flinders St station, police have said. The incident happened about 6:30pm during a rainy peak hour at the corner of Flinders and Swanston streets. Investigators said the were searching for the driver, who did not stop at the scene. The two male pedestrians were being treated for non-life threatening injuries. police said.
